text: "If my producers and I do our jobs," she said that first day, "you will find out what you need to know today, to get yourself through the day — to have a laugh with us, a smile, sometimes a tear. And maybe a little hope to start your day."
title: Megyn Kelly asks Jane Fonda about plastic surgery; schooling ensues
